00030 // Used for randomizing precomputed white noise
00031 static const int prime = 307189;
00032 
00033 affine_image_generator::affine_image_generator(void)
00034 {
00035   original_image = 0;
00036   processed_original_image = 0;
00037   affine_image = 0;
00038   smoothed_generated_object_view = 0;
00039   orientation_corrector = 0;
00040 
00041   white_noise = new char[prime];
00042   limited_white_noise = new char[prime];
00043 
00044   set_default_values();
00045 
00046   local_keypoint_array = new object_keypoint[affine_image_generator::max_point_number];
00047 }
00048 
00049 affine_image_generator::~affine_image_generator(void)
00050 {
00051   if (original_image != 0)
00052     cvReleaseImage(&original_image);
00053   if (processed_original_image != 0)
00054     cvReleaseImage(&processed_original_image);
00055   if (affine_image != 0)
00056     cvReleaseImage(&affine_image);
00057   if (smoothed_generated_object_view != 0)
00058     delete smoothed_generated_object_view;
00059   if (orientation_corrector != 0)
00060     delete orientation_corrector;
00061   delete[] local_keypoint_array;
00062 
00063   if (white_noise) delete[] white_noise;
00064   if (limited_white_noise) delete[] limited_white_noise;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void affine_image_generator::set_default_values(void)
00068 {
00069   localization_noise = 0;
00070 
00071   set_noise_level(20);
00072 
00073   set_range_variation_for_theta(0, float(2.*3.1416));
00074   set_range_variation_for_phi(0, 3.1516f);
00075   independent_scaling(0.5, 1.5, 0.5, 1.5);
00076   //  constrained_scaling(0.7, 1.7, 0.9, 1.1);
00077 
00078   set_use_orientation_correction(true);
00079 
00080   set_use_random_background(false);
00081 
00082   set_patch_size(32);
00083   set_level_number(3);
00084   set_gaussian_smoothing_kernel_size(3);
00085 
00086   set_add_gaussian_smoothing(false);
00087   set_change_intensities(false);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void affine_image_generator::set_noise_level(int noise_level)
00091 {
00092   this->noise_level = noise_level;
00093 
00094   index_white_noise = 0;
00095   for(int i = 0; i < prime; i++)
00096   {
00097     limited_white_noise[i] = char(rand() % (2 * noise_level) - noise_level);
00098     white_noise[i] = char(rand() % 256);
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 void affine_image_generator::set_original_image(IplImage * p_original_image,
00103                                                 int _u_corner1, int _v_corner1, int _u_corner2, int _v_corner2, 
00104                                                 int _u_corner3, int _v_corner3, int _u_corner4, int _v_corner4,
00105                                                 int affine_image_width, int affine_image_height)
00106 {
00107   if (original_image != 0)
00108     cvReleaseImage(&original_image);
00109   original_image = cvCloneImage(p_original_image);
00110 
00111   if (processed_original_image != 0)
00112     cvReleaseImage(&processed_original_image);
00113   processed_original_image = cvCloneImage(p_original_image);
00114 
00115   if (affine_image != 0)
00116     cvReleaseImage(&affine_image);
00117   if (affine_image_width < 0)
00118     affine_image = cvCloneImage(p_original_image);
00119   else
00120     affine_image = cvCreateImage(cvSize(affine_image_width, affine_image_height), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);
00121 
00122   if (smoothed_generated_object_view != 0)
00123     delete smoothed_generated_object_view;
00124   smoothed_generated_object_view = new object_view(original_image->width, original_image->height, level_number);
00125 
00126   if (orientation_corrector != 0)
00127     delete orientation_corrector;
00128   orientation_corrector = new keypoint_orientation_corrector(original_image->width, original_image->height,
00129                                                              patch_size, level_number);
00130 
00131   set_roi(_u_corner1, _v_corner1, 
00132           _u_corner2, _v_corner2, 
00133           _u_corner3, _v_corner3, 
00134           _u_corner4, _v_corner4);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void affine_image_generator::set_preprocessed_image(IplImage *preprocessed)
00138 {
00139 
00140   if (original_image != 0)
00141     cvReleaseImage(&original_image);
00142   original_image = cvCloneImage(preprocessed);
00143 
00144   if (processed_original_image != 0)
00145     cvReleaseImage(&processed_original_image);
00146   processed_original_image = cvCloneImage(preprocessed);
00147 
00148   if (affine_image != 0)
00149     cvReleaseImage(&affine_image);
00150   affine_image = cvCloneImage(preprocessed);
00151 
00152   if (smoothed_generated_object_view != 0)
00153     delete smoothed_generated_object_view;
00154   smoothed_generated_object_view = new object_view(preprocessed->width, preprocessed->height, level_number);
00155 
00156   if (orientation_corrector != 0)
00157     delete orientation_corrector;
00158   orientation_corrector = new keypoint_orientation_corrector(preprocessed->width, preprocessed->height,
00159     patch_size, level_number);
00160 
00161   u_corner1 = 0;                        v_corner1 = 0;
00162   u_corner2 = preprocessed->width - 1;  v_corner2 = 0;
00163   u_corner3 = preprocessed->width - 1;  v_corner3 = preprocessed->height - 1;
00164   u_corner4 = 0;                        v_corner4 = preprocessed->height - 1;
00165 }

00167 void affine_image_generator::set_object_keypoints(object_keypoint * keypoint_array, int p_point_number)
00168 {
00169   used_keypoint_array = keypoint_array;
00170   point_number = p_point_number;
00171 }
00172 
00173 void affine_image_generator::reset_keypoints(void)
00174 {
00175   used_keypoint_array = local_keypoint_array;
00176   point_number = 0;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void affine_image_generator::add_keypoint(float u, float v, int scale, int class_index)
00180 {
00181   assert((unsigned)point_number < 1000);
00182 
00183   local_keypoint_array[point_number].M[0] = u;
00184   local_keypoint_array[point_number].M[1] = v;
00185   local_keypoint_array[point_number].scale = float(scale);
00186   local_keypoint_array[point_number].class_index = class_index;
00187   point_number++;
00188 }

00190 void affine_image_generator::set_level_number(int p_level_number) 
00191 {
00192   level_number = p_level_number; 
00193 
00194   if (affine_image != 0)
00195   {
00196     if (orientation_corrector != 0)
00197       delete orientation_corrector;
00198     orientation_corrector = new keypoint_orientation_corrector(affine_image->width, affine_image->height,
00199       patch_size, level_number);
00200 
00201     if (smoothed_generated_object_view != 0)
00202       delete smoothed_generated_object_view;
00203     smoothed_generated_object_view = new object_view(affine_image->width, affine_image->height, level_number);
00204   }
00205 }

00207 void affine_image_generator::set_patch_size(int p_patch_size)
00208 {
00209   patch_size = p_patch_size; 
00210 
00211   if (original_image != 0)
00212   {
00213     if (orientation_corrector != 0)
00214       delete orientation_corrector;
00215 
00216     orientation_corrector = new keypoint_orientation_corrector(affine_image->width, affine_image->height,
00217                                                                patch_size, level_number);
00218   }
00219 }
00220 
00221 void affine_image_generator::set_roi(int _u_corner1, int _v_corner1, 
00222                                      int _u_corner2, int _v_corner2, 
00223                                      int _u_corner3, int _v_corner3, 
00224                                      int _u_corner4, int _v_corner4)
00225 {
00226   if (_u_corner1 >= 0)
00227   {
00228     u_corner1 = _u_corner1;  v_corner1 = _v_corner1;
00229     u_corner2 = _u_corner2;  v_corner2 = _v_corner2;
00230     u_corner3 = _u_corner3;  v_corner3 = _v_corner3;
00231     u_corner4 = _u_corner4;  v_corner4 = _v_corner4;
00232   }
00233   else
00234   {
00235     u_corner1 = 0;                          v_corner1 = 0;
00236     u_corner2 = original_image->width - 1;  v_corner2 = 0;
00237     u_corner3 = original_image->width - 1;  v_corner3 = original_image->height - 1;
00238     u_corner4 = 0;                          v_corner4 = original_image->height - 1;
00239   }
00240 
00241   cvSmooth(original_image, processed_original_image, CV_MEDIAN, 3, 3);
00242   for(int j = 0; j < processed_original_image->height; j++)
00243   {
00244     unsigned char * row = mcvRow(processed_original_image, j, unsigned char);
00245     for(int i = 0; i < processed_original_image->width; i++)
00246       if (i <= u_corner1 || i <= u_corner4 || i >= u_corner2 || i >= u_corner3 ||
00247           j <= v_corner1 || j <= v_corner2 || j >= v_corner3 || j >= v_corner4)
00248         row[i] = 128;
00249       else
00250         if (row[i] == 128) row[i] = 127;
00251   }
00252 }
00253 
00254 static int min4(int a, int b, int c, int d) 
00255 {
00256   return MIN(a, MIN(b, MIN(c,d)));
00257 }
00258 
00259 static int max4(int a, int b, int c, int d) 
00260 {
00261   return MAX(a, MAX(b, MAX(c,d)));
00262 }
00263 
00264 static float min4(float a, float b, float c, float d) 
00265 {
00266   return MIN(a, MIN(b, MIN(c,d)));
00267 }
00268 
00269 static float max4(float a, float b, float c, float d) 
00270 {
00271   return MAX(a, MAX(b, MAX(c,d)));
00272 }
00273 
00274 bool affine_image_generator::inside_roi(int u, int v)
00275 {
00276   int border_size = 2;
00277 
00278   if (u - border_size < min4(u_corner1, u_corner2, u_corner3, u_corner4)) return false;
00279   if (v - border_size < min4(v_corner1, v_corner2, v_corner3, v_corner4)) return false;
00280   if (u + border_size > max4(u_corner1, u_corner2, u_corner3, u_corner4)) return false;
00281   if (v + border_size > max4(v_corner1, v_corner2, v_corner3, v_corner4)) return false;
00282 
00283   return true;
00284 }

00298   max_phi = p_max_phi;

00302 void affine_image_generator::independent_scaling(float p_min_lambda1, float p_max_lambda1, 
00303                                                  float p_min_lambda2, float p_max_lambda2)
00304 {
00305   scaling_method = 0;
00306 
00307   min_lambda1 = p_min_lambda1;
00308   max_lambda1 = p_max_lambda1;
00309 
00310   min_lambda2 = p_min_lambda2;
00311   max_lambda2 = p_max_lambda2;
00312 }
00313 
00315 void affine_image_generator::constrained_scaling(float p_min_lambda1, float p_max_lambda1, 
00316                                                  float p_min_lambda2, float p_max_lambda2,
00317                                                  float p_min_l1_l2,   float p_max_l1_l2)
00318 {
00319   scaling_method = 1;
00320 
00321   min_lambda1 = p_min_lambda1;
00322   max_lambda1 = p_max_lambda1;
00323 
00324   min_lambda2 = p_min_lambda2;
00325   max_lambda2 = p_max_lambda2;
00326 
00327   min_l1_l2 = p_min_l1_l2;
00328   max_l1_l2 = p_max_l1_l2;
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 void affine_image_generator::generate_random_affine_transformation(void)
00333 {
00334   float theta = min_theta + rand_01() * (max_theta - min_theta);
00335   float phi   = min_phi   + rand_01() * (max_phi - min_phi);
00336   float lambda1, lambda2;
00337   int image_width  = affine_image->width;
00338   int image_height = affine_image->height;
00339 
00340   if (scaling_method == 0)
00341   {
00342     lambda1 = min_lambda1 + rand_01() * (max_lambda1 - min_lambda1);
00343     lambda2 = min_lambda2 + rand_01() * (max_lambda2 - min_lambda2);
00344   }
00345   else
00346   {
00347     do
00348     {
00349       lambda1 = min_lambda1 + rand_01() * (max_lambda1 - min_lambda1);
00350       lambda2 = min_lambda2 + rand_01() * (max_lambda2 - min_lambda2);
00351     } while (lambda1 * lambda2 < min_l1_l2 || lambda1 * lambda2 > max_l1_l2);
00352   }
00353 
00354   mcvComputeAffineTransfo(a, 
00355                           image_width / 2, image_height / 2,
00356                           theta, phi, 
00357                           lambda1, lambda2, 
00358                           0, 0);
00359   int Tx, Ty;
00360   float nu0, nv0, nu1, nv1, nu2, nv2, nu3, nv3;
00361 
00362   affine_transformation(a, image_width, image_height, float(u_corner1), float(v_corner1), nu0, nv0);
00363   affine_transformation(a, image_width, image_height, float(u_corner2), float(v_corner2), nu1, nv1);
00364   affine_transformation(a, image_width, image_height, float(u_corner3), float(v_corner3), nu2, nv2);
00365   affine_transformation(a, image_width, image_height, float(u_corner4), float(v_corner4), nu3, nv3);
00366 
00367   // Moves two of the four corners on the borders of the image to maximize the visible part of the generated view:
00368   if (rand() % 2 == 0)
00369     Tx = - int(min4(nu0, nu1, nu2, nu3)) + patch_size;
00370   else
00371     Tx = image_width - int(max4(nu0, nu1, nu2, nu3)) - patch_size;
00372 
00373   if (rand() % 2 == 0)
00374     Ty = -int(min4(nv0, nv1, nv2, nv3)) + patch_size;
00375   else
00376     Ty = image_height - int(max4(nv0, nv1, nv2, nv3)) - patch_size;
00377 
00378   mcvComputeAffineTransfo(a, 
00379                           image_width / 2, image_height / 2,
00380                           theta, phi, 
00381                           lambda1, lambda2, 
00382                           float(Tx), float(Ty));
00383 }
00384 
00385 void affine_image_generator::generate_Id_affine_transformation(void)
00386 {
00387   int image_width  = affine_image->width;
00388   int image_height = affine_image->height;
00389 
00390   mcvComputeAffineTransfo(a, 
00391                           image_width / 2, image_height / 2,
00392                           0, 0, 
00393                           1., 1., 
00394                           0, 0);
00395 }
00396 
00397 void affine_image_generator::affine_transformation(float p_a[6], int width, int height, 
00398                                                    float u, float v, 
00399                                                    float & nu, float & nv)
00400 {
00401   float det = p_a[0] * p_a[4] - p_a[3] * p_a[1];
00402 
00403   nu = width  / 2 + 1.f / det * ( p_a[4] * (u - p_a[2]) - p_a[1] * (v - p_a[5]));
00404   nv = height / 2 + 1.f / det * (-p_a[3] * (u - p_a[2]) + p_a[0] * (v - p_a[5]));  
00405 }
00406 
00407 void affine_image_generator::inverse_affine_transformation(float p_a[6], int width, int height, 
00408                                                            float u, float v, 
00409                                                            float & nu, float & nv)
00410 {
00411   nu = p_a[0] * (u - width  / 2) + p_a[1] * (v - height / 2) + p_a[2];
00412   nv = p_a[3] * (u - width  / 2) + p_a[4] * (v - height / 2) + p_a[5];
00413 }
00414 
00415 void affine_image_generator::affine_transformation(float u, float v, float & nu, float & nv)
00416 {
00417   affine_transformation(a, affine_image->width, affine_image->height, u, v, nu, nv);
00418 }
00419 
00420 void affine_image_generator::inverse_affine_transformation(float u, float v, float & nu, float & nv)
00421 {
00422   inverse_affine_transformation(a, affine_image->width, affine_image->height, u, v, nu, nv);
00423 }
00424 
00425 void affine_image_generator::preprocess_point_view(image_class_example * pv, object_view * ov)
00426 {
00427   if (use_orientation_correction)
00428   {
00429     // Lowe orientation:
00430     int s = (int)pv->point2d->scale;
00431 
00432     pv->point2d->orientation_in_radians = 
00433       orientation_corrector->estimate_orientation_in_radians(ov->image[s],
00434       int(pv->point2d->u), int(pv->point2d->v), 
00435       ov->gradX[s], ov->gradY[s]);
00436 
00437     assert(pv->preprocessed);
00438 
00439     orientation_corrector->correct_orientationf(ov->image[s],
00440       pv->point2d->u, pv->point2d->v, 
00441       pv->preprocessed, 
00442       pv->point2d->orientation_in_radians, s);
00443   }
00444   else
00445   {
00446     int s = (int)pv->point2d->scale;
00447     assert(pv->preprocessed);
00448     mcvGetPatch(ov->image[s], pv->preprocessed, int(pv->point2d->u), int(pv->point2d->v));
00449   }
00450 }
00451 
00452 void affine_image_generator::add_white_noise(IplImage * image)
00453 {
00454   for(int y = 0; y < image->height; y++)
00455   {
00456     unsigned char * line = (unsigned char *)(image->imageData + y * image->widthStep);
00457 
00458     for(int x = 0; x < image->width; x++)
00459     {
00460       int p = line[x];
00461 
00462       p += limited_white_noise[index_white_noise];
00463 
00464       if (p > 255) 
00465         p = 255;
00466       else if (p < 0)
00467         p = 0;
00468 
00469       line[x] = (unsigned char)p;
00470 
00471       index_white_noise++;
00472       if (index_white_noise >= prime) index_white_noise = 1 + rand() % 6;
00473     }
00474   }
00475 }
00476 
00477 void affine_image_generator::replace_by_noise(IplImage * image, int value)
00478 {
00479   for(int y = 0; y < image->height; y++)
00480   {
00481     unsigned char * row = mcvRow(image, y, unsigned char);
00482 
00483     for(int x = 0; x < image->width; x++)
00484       if (int(row[x]) == value)
00485       {
00486         row[x] = white_noise[index_white_noise];
00487         index_white_noise++;
00488         if (index_white_noise >= prime) index_white_noise = 1 + rand() % 6;
00489       }
00490   }
00491 }
00492 
00493 void affine_image_generator::generate_affine_image(void)
00494 {
00495   CvMat A = cvMat(2, 3, CV_32F, a);
00496 
00497   cvSet(affine_image, cvScalar(128));
00498 
00499 #if 0
00500   cvGetQuadrangleSubPix(processed_original_image, affine_image, &A);
00501 #else
00502   float w = -(affine_image->width-1)/2;
00503   float h = -(affine_image->height-1)/2;
00504   float sa[9];
00505   memcpy(sa,a,9*sizeof(float));
00506   a[2] += w*a[0] +h*a[1]; 
00507   a[5] += w*a[3] +h*a[4]; 
00508   cvWarpAffine(processed_original_image, affine_image, &A,CV_INTER_LINEAR+CV_WARP_INVERSE_MAP);
00509   memcpy(a,sa,9*sizeof(float));
00510 #endif
00511 
00512   if (use_random_background)
00513     replace_by_noise(affine_image, 128);
00514   else
00515     mcvReplace(affine_image, 128, (int)128);
00516 
00517   if (add_gaussian_smoothing)
00518   {
00519     if (rand() % 3 == 0)
00520     {
00521       int aperture = 3 + 2 * (rand() % 3);
00522       cvSmooth(affine_image, affine_image, CV_GAUSSIAN, aperture, aperture);
00523     }
00524 
00525     if (change_intensities)
00526       cvCvtScale(affine_image, affine_image, rand(0.8f, 1.2f), rand(-10.f, 10.f));
00527 
00528     if (noise_level > 0)
00529       add_white_noise(affine_image);
00530 
00531     if (0)
00532     {
00533       static int n = 0;
00534       mcvSaveImage("affine%04d.bmp", n, affine_image);
00535       n++;
00536     }
00537   }
00538 }
00539 
00540 void affine_image_generator::generate_object_view(void)
00541 {
00542   generate_affine_image();
00543 
00544   smoothed_generated_object_view->build(affine_image, gaussian_smoothing_kernel_size);
00545 }
00546 
00547 vector<image_class_example *> * affine_image_generator::generate_random_examples(void)
00548 {
00549   generate_random_affine_transformation();
00550   generate_object_view();
00551 
00552   vector<image_class_example *> * result = new vector<image_class_example *>;
00553 
00554   for(int i = 0; i < point_number; i++)
00555   {
00556     object_keypoint * kp = &(used_keypoint_array[i]);
00557     int scale = int(kp->scale);
00558     IplImage * im = smoothed_generated_object_view->image[scale];
00559     float nu, nv;
00560 
00561     affine_transformation(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(kp->M[0]), scale, 0), 
00562                           PyrImage::convCoordf(float(kp->M[1]), scale, 0),
00563                           nu, nv);
00564 
00565     nu = PyrImage::convCoordf(nu, 0, scale) + localization_noise * rand_m1p1();
00566     nv = PyrImage::convCoordf(nv, 0, scale) + localization_noise * rand_m1p1();
00567 
00568     if ((int)nu > patch_size && (int)nu < im->width  - patch_size &&
00569         (int)nv > patch_size && (int)nv < im->height - patch_size)
00570     {
00571       image_class_example * pv = new image_class_example(kp->class_index, 
00572                                                          nu, nv, (float)scale, 
00573                                                          smoothed_generated_object_view, 
00574                                                          patch_size);
00575       pv->orig_u = float(kp->M[0]);
00576       pv->orig_v = float(kp->M[1]);
00577 
00578       preprocess_point_view(pv, smoothed_generated_object_view);
00579 
00580       result->push_back(pv);
00581       point_views.push_back(pv);
00582     }
00583   }
00584 
00585   return result;
00586 }
00587 
00588 void affine_image_generator::release_examples(void)
00589 {
00590   for(vector<object_view *>::iterator ov_it = generated_object_views_for_learning.begin();
00591       ov_it < generated_object_views_for_learning.end();
00592       ov_it++)
00593   {
00594     delete *ov_it;
00595   }
00596 
00597   generated_object_views_for_learning.clear();
00598 
00599   for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator pv_it = point_views.begin();
00600       pv_it < point_views.end();
00601       pv_it++)
00602   {
00603     delete *pv_it;
00604   }
00605 
00606   point_views.clear();
00607 }
